news.title: Wikipedia blacklists Archive.today after alleged DDoS attack
news.summary: Wikipedia editors have decided to remove all links to Archive.today, a web archiving service that they said has been linked to more than 695,000 times across the online encyclopedia.

news.summary: As generative AI evolves, a Google VP warns that LLM wrappers and AI aggregators face mounting pressure, with shrinking margins and limited differentiation threatening their long-term viability.

news.title: Georgia says Elon Musk’s America PAC violated election law
news.summary: For all his bluster about voter fraud, Elon Musk has been one of the most flagrant flaunters of US election law.
